title.zh: 斯坦科留学管理服务中心

zh: 是您在美国的朋友，老师和亲
为您美国的学习，生活护航
这您在养恩学习，工作，定居提状今

text.en: The Student Transit Assist Center (known as STAC) is located in San Jose, in the heart of Silicon Valley, California. We are dedicated to serving international students attending schools in this region. We firmly believe that success comes from professional and comprehensive service. Currently, our center has established long-term strategic partnerships with a number of renowned educational institutions in the United States and well-known study abroad agencies in China. Based on a thorough review of our past services, we are committed to creating a more efficient, effective, and comprehensive one-stop service for studying in the U.S. We provide a range of services to support students' transitions, including housing assistance, student supervision and management, academic advising, tutoring, and more. However, we are not an agency and do not provide agency services. Our 24/7 services assist students in case of emergencies, ensuring a smooth transition to school and dorm life.
text.zh: 留学不仅是在学校求学，学生也要在日常生活中学习到各种不同文化及知识。但是中美文化的差异，生活方式的不同，留学生活中必然会有各种问题的出现。对于初来乍到的学生们需要帮手来协调生活琐事，避免生活琐事的打扰帮助学生适应美国生活环境的差异，更快的融入其中。 斯坦科留学管理中心就是您最贴心的留学助手。 我们立足加州硅谷，拥有经验丰富团队，为每个学生量身定做最适合的美国留学计划，提供优质的留学生活辅导，为您美国的学习，生活护航。

text.en: STAC Center is conveniently located near the headquarters of Apple Inc. and just a 10-minute walk from Westgate Shopping Center, where you can find everything you need. The bus stop is right in front of the STAC Center, offering easy access to anywhere you want to go.
text.zh: 斯坦科留学管理中心地理位置优越，毗邻苹果公司总部，距离Westgate购物中心仅有10分钟步行路程，在那里您可以找到所需的一切。门前的公车方便您去硅谷地区的任何地方。

text.en: High-quality, affordable private spaces where you can enjoy comfortable accommodation.
text.zh: 斯坦科留学管理中心公寓为国际留学生提供舒适，安全，良好的生活环境。

en: Monthly reports can be requested by parents
Kitchen, dining room, and laundry facilities are communal
zh: 全建筑空调, 免费公共Wi-Fi覆盖, 出入使用门禁卡管理, 并附有公共厨房、餐厅和洗衣房。公寓房内配有全套家具,个人小冰箱。

text.en: Prices vary based on the type of room. Please check for the price and availability. The demand for the dormitory is extremely high in Silicon Valley Area. Space at STAC is limited. Join US now!
text.zh: 由于公寓的房间有限，价格根据房型而有所不同。请立即查询价格和空房情况。硅谷地区对学生公寓的需求极高，请尽早联系预定。

description.en: Single rooms: one twin XL bed, each bathroom is shared by only two students.
description.zh: 单人床单间，两人合用厕所

description.en: Bunk beds room: Two beds at top bunk and lower bunk, shared bathroom.
2 Queen Room: Two queen size beds with own bathroom
description.zh: 双大床酒店标准间，自用卫生间

description.en: King Room: One king size beds with own bathroom
description.zh: 国王大床酒店标准间，自用卫生间

description.en: One bed room suite with kitchenette and own bathroom

text.en: STAC Apartments are the officially recommended dormitories for DeAnza College. We provide the most convenient and professional service experience for our partners. With 24/7 service and security monitoring, we significantly reduce the service load on partners for your students after arriving in the U.S. Welcome to all educational agencies and institutions for collaboration. We aim to become your long-term partner in providing services for your students.
text.zh: 斯坦科留学管理中心公寓是DeAnza学院官方推荐的学生公寓。我们一向坚信成功源于专业与完善的服务。现阶段斯坦科留学管理中心已同一批美国知名高校，中国知名留学机构建立了长期合作战略伙伴关系。斯坦科留学管理中心在全面总结过去的服务基础上，全力打造更到位，更高效率，更完善的专业化一站式留学服务。斯坦科留学管理服务中心欢迎国内外留学机构，高校与我们联系建立合作关系。成为你们美国留学生客户接待, 管理, 服务的长期合作伙伴。通过24/7全天候服务和安全监控，我们减轻了学生客户抵达美国后留学机构的服务负担。我们致力于为您和学生提供服务并成为长期合作伙伴。欢迎所有留学机构和院校前来合作。
